column2: In the System Manager select I/O - Configuration â†’ I/ODevices.Press the Scan in the toolbar or right-click on I/O Devicesand select Scan Devices....In both cases, the following sequence starts:
Close the information window with OK.
Select the devices to be automatically added to theTwinCAT project.As a minimum, select the device with the supplement(EtherCAT).Complete the selection with OK.
